changelog: [BETA] Added support for ultrawide and super-ultrawide resolutions.
Ensured that external configs are loaded before player data is processed.
Increased the speed of loading external configs.
Fixed an issue where skill effect data was retrieved before external configs were loaded.
Two new variables added to configs/shared.lua: Shared.ExtraRewardsEnabled and Shared.ExtraRewards.
These variables allow the ability to receive an extra item when mining ore, which can later be smelted into another item.
This feature doesn't impact the job itself and is just an optional addition.
If you want extra items to drop only from ores, set smeltingChance to 0.
Fixed an issue with the 2x drop skill where it was possible to collect more ore than the limit (e.g., 7 out of 6).
Fixed a bug with Skill Tree loading.
